## qiushibaike

### Packages

```{r}
library(httr)
library(rvest)
library(magrittr)
```

### HTML
1. read_thml
2. read_xml
```{r}
douban <- read_html("https://book.douban.com/top250?icn=index-book250-all",encoding="UTF-8")
```


### Parse
#### list
1. html_nodes
2. html_table
3. html_text
4. html_form
#### method
1. method A
```{r}
douban_book <- html_nodes(douban, "p.pl")
douban_book
```
2. method B 
```{r}
douban_links <- html_nodes(douban, xpath = "//td//div//a")
douban_links
```
